250:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrīmati himavatkukṣau vividharasaviryavipākaguṇairbahubhiroṣadhiviśeṣaiḥ parigṛhītabhūmibhāge nāṇāvidhapuṣpaphalapallavapatraviṭaparaparacanairmahīruhaśatairākīrṇe sphaṭikadalāmalasalilaprasravaṇe vividhapakṣigaṇanādanādite vānarayūthādhipatirbabhūva|
250:5: sa tatra mahāntaṃ nyagrodhapādapaṃ parvataśikharamiva vyomollikhantamadhipatimiva tasya vanasya meghasaṃghātamiva pratyandhakāraviṭapamākīrṇaparṇatayā tālaphalādhikatarapramāṇaiḥ paramasvādubhirmanojñavarṇagandhaiḥ phalaviśeṣairānamyamānaśākhaṃ niśritya vijahāra|
250:8: tasya tu vanaspaterekā śākhā tatsamīpagāṃ nimnagāmabhi praṇatābhavat|
250:9: atha bodhisattvo dīrghadarśitvāttadvānarayūthaṃ samanuśaśāsa - asyāṃ nyogrodhaśākhāyāmaphalāyāmakṛtāyāṃ na vaḥ kena cidanyataḥ phalamupabhoktavyamiti|
250:10: atha kadācittasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ pipīlikābhiḥ parṇapuṭāvacchāditaṃ taruṇatvānnātimahadekaṃ phalaṃ na te vānarā dadṛśuḥ|
250:11: tatkrameṇābhivardhamānaṃ varṇagandharasamārdavopapannaṃ paripākavaśācchithilabandhanaṃ tasyāṃ nadyāṃ nipapāta|
250:12: anupūrveṇa vāhyamāna nadīstrotasā'nyatamasya rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasya tasyāṃ nadyāṃ salilakrīḍāmanubhavato jālakaraṇḍakapārśve vyāsajyata|
250:17: kaūtuhalaprasṛtalolataranayanāstu tā yoṣitastannyagrodhaphalaṃ paripakvatālaphalādhikatarapramāṇaṃ jālakaraṇḍakapārśvato vilagnamavekṣya kimidamiti tadāvarjitanayanāḥ samapdyanta saha rājñā|
250:18: atha sa rājā tatphalamānāyya prātyayikavaidyajanaparidṛṣṭaṃ svayamāsvādayāmāsa|
250:23: atha tasya rājñaḥ svādurasabhojanasamucitasyāpi tadrasasaṃrāgavaśagasyaitada bhavat-
250:24: yo nāma nāmūni phalāni bhuṅkte sa kāni rājyasya phalāni bhuṅkte|
250:25: yasyānnametattu ca eva rājā vinaiva rājatvapariśrameṇa||6||
250:26: sa tatprabhavānveṣaṇakṛtamatiḥ svabuddhyā vimamarśa-vyaktamayaṃ taruvara ito nātidūre nadītīrasaṃniviṣṭaśca yasyedaṃ phalam ! tathā hyanupahatavarṇagandharasamadīrghakālasalilasaṃparkādaparikṣatamajarjaraṃ ca yataḥ śakyamasya prabhavo'dhigantumiti niścayamupetya tadrasatṛṣṇayā ākṛṣyamāṇo viramya jalakrīḍāyāḥ samyak puravare sve rakṣāvidhānaṃ saṃdiśya yātrāsajjena mahatā balakāyena parivṛtastāṃ nadīmanusasāra|
250:27: krameṇa cotsādayan saśvāpadagaṇāni vanagahanāni samanubhavaṃ ścatrāṇi rasāntarāṇi paśyannakṛtrimaramaṇīyaśobhāni vanāntarāṇi saṃtrāsayan paṭaharasitairavanyagajamṛgān mānuṣajanadurgamaṃ tasya vanaspateḥ samīpamupajagāma|
250:30: paripakvasahakāraphalasurabhitareṇa ca nirhāriṇā atimanojñena gandhena pratyudgata iva tasya pādapasya ayaṃ sa vanaspatiriti niścayamupajagāma|
250:32: atha sa rājā samabhilaṣitārthavipralopinastān vānarān pratyabhikruddhamatiḥ-hata hataitān|
250:33: vidhvaṃsayata vināśayata sarvān vānarajālmāniti saparuṣākṣaraṃ svān puruṣānādideśa|
250:34: atha te rājapuruṣāḥ sajyacāpabāṇavyagrakarāgrā vānarāvabhartsanamukharāḥ samudyataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrāścāpare paradurgamivābhiroddhukāmāstaṃ vanaspatimabhisasruḥ|
250:35: atha bodhisattvastumulaṃ tadrājabalamanilajavākalitamivārṇavajalamanibhṛtakalakalārāvamabhipatadālokyāśanivarṣeṇeva samantato vikīryamāṇaṃ taruvaraṃ śaraloṣṭadaṇḍaśastravarṣeṇa bhayavirasavirāvamātraparāyaṇaṃ ca vikṛtadīnamukhamunmukhaṃ vānaragaṇamavekṣya mahatyā karuṇayā samākramyamāṇacetāstyaktaviṣādadainyasaṃtrāsaḥ samāśvāsya tadvānarayūthaṃ tatparitrāṇavyavasitamatirabhiruhya tasya vanaspateḥ śikharaṃ tatsamāsannaṃ giritaṭaṃ laṅghayitumiyeṣa|
250:36: athānekapraskandanakramaprāpyamapi taṃ giritaṭaṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ svavīryātiśayātkhaga ivādhiruroha|
250:39: kṛpayābhivivardhitaḥ sa tasya vyavasāyaḥ paṭutāṃ jagāma śauryāt|
250:40: sa ca yatnaviśeṣamasya cakre manasaivātha jagāma yatnataikṣṇyāt||9||
250:41: adhiruhya ca gireruccataraṃ tātapradeśaṃ tadantarālādhikapramāṇayā mahatyā virūḍhayā'śithilamūlayā dṛḍhayā vetralatayā gāḍhamābadhya caraṇau punastaṃ vanaspatiṃ pracaskandaḥ|
250:42: viprakṛṣṭatvāttu tasyāntarālasya caraṇabandhanavyākulatvācca sa mahāsattvaḥ kathaṃcittasya vanaspateragraśākhāṃ karābhyāṃ samāsasāda|
250:43: tataḥ samālambya dṛḍhaṃ sa śākhāmātatya tāṃ vetralatāṃ ca yatnāt|
250:47: gātraṃ yayau svaiḥ piśitairviyogaṃ na tveva dhairyātiśayena cetaḥ||11||
250:48: taddṛṣṭvā sa rājā te ca rājapuruṣāḥ parāṃ vismayavaktavyatāmupajagmuḥ|
250:51: atha sa rājā tān puruṣān samādideśa-bhayodbhrāntavānaragaṇacaraṇakṣobhitakṣataśarīraściramekakramāvasthānācca dṛḍhaṃ pariśrānto vyaktamayaṃ vānarādhipatiḥ na cāya mataḥ śakṣyati svayamātmānaṃ saṃhartum,
250:52: tacchrīghramasyādhaḥ paṭavitānaṃ vitatya vitralateyaṃ ca nyagrodhaśākhā śārābhyāṃ yugapatpracchidyetāmiti|
250:54: athainaṃ sa rājā śanakairvitānādavatārya murchayā vraṇavedanāklamopajātayā samākramyamāṇacetasaṃ mṛduni śayanīye saṃveśayāmāsa|
250:55: sadyaḥkṣatapraśamanayogyaiśca sarpirādibhirasya vraṇānyabhyajya mandībhūtapariśramaṃ samāśvastamenamabhyupagamya sa rājā sakautūhalavismayabahumānaḥ kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakamuvāca-
250:56: gatvā svayaṃ saṃkramatāmamīṣāṃ svajīvite tyaktadayena bhutvā|
250:57: samuddhṛtā ye kapayastvayeme ko nu tvameṣāṃ tava vā ka ete||13||
250:60: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñastadabhyupapattisaumukhyaṃ pratipūjayannātmanivedanamanuguṇena krameṇa cakāra-
250:65: tacchrutvā sa rājā paraṃ vismayamupetya punarenamuvāca-
250:73: idaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vyasanārtidainyaṃ śākhāmṛgān pratyabhivardhamānam|
250:80: tataḥ karābhyāṃ samavāpamasya prasāritaṃ prasāritaṃ pāṇimivāgraśākhām ||22||
250:81: samātatāṅgaṃ latayā tayā ca śākṣāgrahastena ca pādapasya|
250:82: amī madadhyākramaṇe viśaṅkā niśritya māṃ svasti gatāḥ svayūthyāḥ||23||
250:83: atha sa rājā pramodyajātaṃ tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃ taṃ mahāsattvamavekṣya paraṃ vismayamudvahan punarenamuvāca-
250:85: ityātmani samāropya prāptaḥ ko bhavatā guṇaḥ||24||
250:87: kāmaṃ śarīraṃ kṣitipa kṣataṃ me manaḥ parasvāsthyamupāgataṃ tu|
250:90: vīrā yathā vikramacihnaśobhāṃ prītyā tathemāṃ rujamudvahāmi||26||
250:93: tanmāṃ tapatyeṣa na duḥkhayogaḥ suhṛdviyogaḥ sukhaviplavo vā|
250:94: krameṇa cānena amabhyupeto mahotsavābhyāgama eṣa mṛtyuḥ||28||
250:96: pūjā nṛpānnirbhayatā ca mṛtyoḥ kṛtajñabhāvād grahaṇaṃ ca satsu||29||
250:97: ete guṇāḥ sadguṇavāsavṛkṣa prāptā mayaitad vyasanaṃ prapadya|
250:98: eṣāṃ vipakṣāṃstu samabhyupaiti dayāvihīno nṛpatiḥ śriteṣu||30||
250:100: gatirbhavettasya ca nama kānyā jvālākulebhyo narakānalebhyaḥ||31||
250:102: dharmeṇa tasmādanuśādhi rājyaṃ strīcañcalapremaguṇā hi lakṣmīḥ||32||
250:104: sarvān sukhena prayateta yoktuṃ hitānukūlena piteva rājā||33||
250:105: evaṃ hi dharmārthayaśaḥsamṛddhiḥ syātte sukhāyeha paratra caiva|
250:107: iti nṛpamanuśiṣya śisyavad bahumatavākprayatena tena saḥ|
250:111: na samarthāstathā svārthamapi pratipattuṃ sattvā yathā parārthaṃ pratipannavān sa bhagavāniti tathāgatavarṇe'pi vācyam|
